name: Golf: Facility Breach
description:
Note: Game is playable within both the minimised and maximised version, but may run smoother in the minimised display.

Controls Keyboard

K = Disable arrow outline.

A = Hold to change direction of ball angle (left).

D = Hold to change direction of ball angle (right).

W = Increase ball shooting power.

S = Decrease ball shooting power.

Left mouse button = Click the ball to shoot.

Objective

Putt the ball into the teleporter at the end of each hole course in as fewer strokes as possible. Avoid any black goo as it may hinder your escape and try not to get detected by the facility's security systems.

Known Bugs/Inconsistencies

- If the ball is hit against a wall at a power that is too high, the ball may clip through the wall. If this happens, you will need to reload the page, but it shouldn't happen too often.

Game Story

The science facility has suffered a breach of a once-contained and potentially dangerous test subject, destroying it's surroundings and harming multiple science personnel. Make your way through the breached facility until you manage to escape.

Credits
